Documentation

hB Source #

Arguments

:: (Float, Float)

(x,y)-coordinates of the point

-> Picture

the resulting picture

Draws a horizontal block of length 120 drawn from a given point.

vB Source #

Arguments

:: (Float, Float)

(x,y)-coordinates of the point

-> Picture

the resulting picture

Draws a vertical block of length 120 drawn from a given point.

dB Source #

Arguments

:: (Float, Float)

(x,y)-cordinates of the first point

-> (Float, Float)

(x,y)-cordinates of the second point

-> Picture

the resulting picture

Draws a diagonal block between two given points.
